pullRequest.title: Added a separate module for backend JWT generation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Add a separate module (micro-gateway-jwt-generator) for back-end JWT generation and changed the integration test to accommodate testing with a external jar file.
Fixes #1196
Automation tests

Unit tests added: No
Integration tests added: Yes

Tested environments
Ubuntu 20.04 LTS

Maintainers: Check before merge

 Assigned 'Type' label
 Assigned the project
 Validated respective github issues
 Assigned milestone to the github issue(s)

commit.message: separate module added for jwt generation, updated test cases
conf template changed, skew time duplicated assignment removed
checking backendJwt claim added with tests
